solution_line_template: From her daughters, Olga has {num_daughters} x {sons_per_daughter} = <<{num_daughters}*{sons_per_daughter}={grandsons_from_daughters}>>{grandsons_from_daughters} grandsons.
From her sons, she has {num_sons} x {daughters_per_son} = <<{num_sons}*{daughters_per_son}={granddaughters_from_sons}>>{granddaughters_from_sons} granddaughters.
